com.hero.rssreader

类 Adapters.CursorBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hero.rssreader.Adapters.CursorBinder
  • 封闭类:
    Adapters

    public abstract static class Adapters.CursorBinder
extends java.lang.Object

    Interface used to bind a android.database.Cursor column to a View. This interface can be used to provide bindings for data types not supported by the standard implementation of Adapters.

    A binder is provided with a cursor transformation which may or may not be used to transform the value retrieved from the cursor. The transformation is guaranteed to never be null so it's always safe to apply the transformation.

    The binder is associated with a Context but can be re-used with multiple cursors. As such, the implementation should make no assumption about the Cursor in use.

    另请参阅:
    android.view.View, android.database.Cursor, Adapters.CursorTransformation

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Adapters.CursorBinder

        public Adapters.CursorBinder(Context context,
                     Adapters.CursorTransformation transformation)

        Creates a new Cursor binder.

        参数:
        context - The context associated with this binder.
        transformation - The transformation associated with this binder. This transformation may or may not be applied by the binder and is guaranteed to not be null.

    • 方法详细资料

      • bind

        public abstract boolean bind(View view,
           Cursor cursor,
           int columnIndex)

        Binds the specified Cursor column to the supplied View. The binding operation can query other Cursor columns as needed. During the binding operation, values retrieved from the Cursor may or may not be transformed using this binder's cursor transformation.

        参数:
        view - The view to bind data to.
        cursor - The cursor to bind data from.
        columnIndex - The column index in the cursor where the data to bind resides.
        返回:
        True if the column was successfully bound to the View, false otherwise.
        另请参阅:
        mTransformation
